name: Forbidden Trapezohedron
desc:
Apply this effect, depending on the Extra Deck monster card types (Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz) of monsters you control. You must control exactly 2 different monster card types to activate and to resolve this effect.
● Fusion and Synchro: Special Summon 1 "Outer Entity" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, and if you do, attach this card to it as Xyz Material.
● Synchro and Xyz: Special Summon 1 "Elder Entity" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.
● Xyz and Fusion: Special Summon 1 "Old Entity" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck.
You can only activate 1 "Forbidden Trapezohedron" per turn.
str2: Special Summon 1 "Outer God" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck
str3: Special Summon 1 "Elder God" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.
str4: Special Summon 1 "Great Old God" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck
